ygData.subject: Re: To the IGL
ygData.msgSnippet: Windlord:: I ll go to meet Iron Raptor as soon as I m sure that all my friends are ok said Windlord to Cledar Good luck to IGL ... back to his troops.

Windlord::

"I'll go to meet Iron Raptor as soon as I'm sure that all my friends 
are ok" said Windlord to Cledar "Good luck to IGL"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Cledar/Forrior/Blyer/Rixer/Firearm::
> 
> Cledar sees that Windlord was talking to someone else, and walks 
back to his troops. "Allright, Rixer, go back to the city for 
repairs. Me, Forrior, and Blyer will go to the IGL to see if we can 
register late. We'll meet you after the competition."
> 
> Rixer nods, turning and moving off toward Maximal City. Blyer opens 
his cockpit, Cledar and Forrior climbing in. He jets off toward the 
IGL.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm looks around, seeing that there was no one to fight, and 
also setting off toward the IGL, wanting to watch or participate if 
he could join late.
